notes.text:
This update for gettext-runtime fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-18751: Fixed a double free (bsc#1113719)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in GNU gettext 0.19.8. There is a double free in default_add_message in read-catalog.c, related to an invalid free in po_gram_parse in po-gram-gen.y, as demonstrated by lt-msgfmt.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
